categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter classes

nodes.text: The Heavy Y-wing was a larger scale BTL Y-wing bomber utilized by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It possessed four engine pods rather than just two. Four of the Heavy Y-wings were deployed in the Seizure of Coruscant as part of New Republic General Han Solo's strike force.
The Heavy Y-wings appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
